author: adityapatwardhan
body:
Travis CI nightly badge update logic fails with error 'ResourceNotFound'. This happens for successful or unsuccessful build. 

Example of failure: https://s3.amazonaws.com/archive.travis-ci.org/jobs/261697180/log.txt?X-Amz-Expires=30&X-Amz-Date=20170807T175825Z&X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIAJRYRXRSVGNKPKO5A/20170807/us-east-1/s3/aws4_request&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=19a7d15449f4a8b6007330a4b4023dc013e837f129d0b1b3fdd65015d47cd44e

comments.author: JamesWTruher
comments.body: this particular problem is fixed with: https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/4522

title: Travis CI nightly build badge does not update
